for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n=int(raw_input())
    lis1=map(int,raw_input().split())
    lis2=map(int,raw_input().split())
    lis2, lis1 = (list(x) for x in zip(*sorted(zip(lis2, lis1))))
    #print lis1,lis2
    maxi=0
    for i in xrange(len(lis1)):
        count=1
        for j in xrange(len(lis1)):
            if i!=j:
                if lis1[j]<lis2[i] and lis2[j]>=lis2[i]:
                    count+=1
        if count>maxi:
            maxi=count
    print maxi
